an6.98:1.2.pli: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:1.2.en: Without accepting views that conform with the teaching, it’s impossible to enter the sure path.

an6.98:1.3.pli: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ anokkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:1.3.en: Without entering the sure path, it’s impossible to realize the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection.

an6.98:2.2.pli: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:2.2.en: Having accepted views that conform with the teaching, it’s possible to enter the sure path.

an6.98:2.3.pli: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
an6.98:2.3.en: Having entered the sure path, it’s possible to realize the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection.”

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an5.151:1.1.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:1.1.en: “Mendicants, someone with five qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities even when listening to the true teaching.

an5.151:1.4.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:1.4.en: Someone with these five qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, even when listening to the true teaching.

an5.151:2.1.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:2.1.en: Someone with five qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.

an5.151:2.4.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
an5.151:2.4.en: Someone with these five qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.”

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 5.153
16. The True Teaching
Surety in the Right Way (3rd)

an6.86:1.1.pli: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an6.86:1.1.en: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities even when listening to the true teaching.

an6.86:1.4.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 6.88
9. Coolness
Wanting to Listen

an3.22:5.3.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya alabhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya, labhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya alabhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya neva okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:5.3.en: Some people don’t enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, regardless of whether or not they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims.

an3.22:6.1.pli: Idha, pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya alabhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya, labhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya alabhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:6.1.en: Some people do enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, regardless of whether or not they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims.

an3.22:7.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhantova tathāgataṁ dassanāya no alabhanto, labhantova tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya no alabhanto okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:7.1.en: Some people can enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, but only if they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims, and not when they don’t get those things.

an3.22:8.1.pli: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ puggalo labhantova tathāgataṁ dassanāya no alabhanto, labhantova tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya no alabhanto okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ, imaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalaṁ paṭicca dhammadesanā anuññātā.
an3.22:8.1.en: Now, it’s for the sake of this last individual that teaching the Dhamma is prescribed, that is, the one who can enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, but only if they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims.

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

snp2.13:13.1.en: Faithful, learned, seer of the sure path,
